  • 2005-07-25 14:37:41

    pnATutor1.4

    I've located pnATutor 1.4
    Here it is.

    I've had no issue with pnATutor1.2 and ATutor1.4. The install of ATutor1.5 appears to work for me as well.

    Re: the pnATutor/ATutor integration, this pn module does a great job of bridging the tw applications. I had to do more tweaking in the past to ensure that pages stayed within the iframe of postnuke ... but the target window in 1.5 seems to be much better at not leaping out of postnuke into a standalone ATutor window.

    IMHO, this is a much better solution than the moodle/postnuke combo.

    I've created an excel spreadsheet (with multiple sheets) that allows me to generate the insert commands t batch enter students into the postnuke (and pnphpbb2) tables, as well as generate the import script for ATutor. For a large number of users, this is superior to manually entering the users into postnuke groups and setting specific pnphpbb2 forum access, based upon the courses they are taking.
